name: Imbattable - Tome 2 - Super-héros de proximité
summary: Sure, he helps widows and orphans as any self-respecting hero would, but he also thwarts mad scientists and bad guys with his amazing ability to defy the rules of ‘comic book physics’. He and his companions of similarly powered-heroes are able to do amazing things that are only possible thanks to the magic of comics… This second issue introduces the color-shifting stranger and the return of the Jester!
info:
• 别名: 無敵救星 第二卷：法國製超級英雄
